channel.title: Biosecurity on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Biosecurity on FinanClub

item.title: 1433 DNA
item.description: score:1433 Chances: Ginkgo Bioworks has entered into a Memorandum of Understanding with the Government of Panama to develop new biosecurity capabilities in Latin America, indicating potential growth opportunities in the region. The company has been awarded a 4-year contract worth up to $18 million by DARPA to reimagine how to manufacture complex therapeutic proteins, suggesting advancements in protein manufacturing.
